item.title: Professional writers online
item.description: It’s been about four months since my classmates and I graduated from the Print Futures Professional Writing Program. If you’re serious about your craft and are thinking of attending this two-year diploma program, I heartily encourage you to go for it. I love to write and I love getting paid to do it even more. But don’t kid yourself - writing well works up a mental sweat for every writer, whether oozing with talent or not.
